column4: hey guys... I have previously set up a dual boot into /boot/grub/grub.conf, but now I want to edit it and the file seems to be completely gone... it's not in /etc/ either... any ideas? (the dual boot does work properly, so it has to be somewhere...)
there is a simple command to detect other os... lemme find it
lol where did they hide it? :D
I did manually change it before on 9.10 I think... the file is missing now though lol
I just went through the same thing
haha yeah, was driving me nuts
actually Pholious, thats not the one I read...
I just editted the /boot/grub/menu.lst, does the trick ;)
